Definitions.Paraphrase:
[C] a kind of aircraft which is able to fly at extremely high speeds 
喷气式飞机
We took a jet to the big island.  
我们乘喷气式飞机去了那个大岛。
He is very wealthy and owns a $600,000 house and a private jet.  
他很富有，拥有一幢价值60万美元的豪宅和一架私人喷气式飞机。

[C] a person who repairs or works with machines, esp. as a job 
技工，机械工人
The mechanic phoned to say your car was ready for collection.  
汽车修理工来电话说你可以去取车了。
That's the mechanic who repaired my car.  
那就是给我修汽车的机修工。
You'd better take your car to your mechanic before you drive it to Hangzhou. 
你开车去杭州之前，最好把车开去让你的机械师看看。

fasten (sb./sth.) in place with a strong narrow band of material 
捆，扎，绑
Are the kids strapped into their car seats?  
孩子们系好安全带了吗？
He had a gun strapped to his middle.  
他腰间系着枪。

[C] a narrow piece of leather or other strong material 
带，皮带
Could you help me fasten the strap around my suitcase?  
你能帮我把手提箱的箱带绑紧吗？
I need a new watch strap.  
我需要一条新表带。

[C] a piece of equipment with straps used to control a horse; similar equipment, as worn by a parachutist or for controlling a small child 
马具；类似马具的装备（如降落伞背带或幼童的系带）
She lifted the harness over the horse's head.  
她把马具从马头上取下。
A seat and harness for a child are essential in a family car. 
家用汽车配备儿童座和安全带是很必要的。

1. put a harness on (a horse, etc.) 
给（马等）上马具
He harnessed the horse to a wagon. 
他把马套到四轮马车上。
2. control and use (a natural force) to produce electrical power, etc. 
利用（自然力）发电等
The local government decided to harness the river to generate electricity. 
当地政府决定利用河水发电。

1. fill (a hole) or stop up 
堵，塞
My wall has a hole in it. I have to plug it with some cement.
我的墙上有个洞，我得用点水泥把它填上。
2. fit a plug into a socket  
插上（插头）
If you plug the video camera into the television, you can play back the tape you've recorded.  
把摄像机接上电视机就可以重放你录的磁带。
He has a hearing device plugged into his ear.  
他耳朵里戴着助听器。

[C] a plastic object with two or three metal pins which is pushed into an electric socket to connect an apparatus with the electricity supply 
插头
If a plug is wired incorrectly, it can be dangerous.  
如果插头接线不对会很危险。
Do you know how to wire a plug?  
你知道怎样给插头接上电线吗？

1. [U] the force which attracts objects in space towards each other 
重力，万有引力
the laws of gravity  
万有引力定律
Gravity acts within and between stars, planets and spacecraft.  
万有引力作用于恒星、行星和宇宙飞船内部和彼此之间。
2. [U] seriousness
严重（性）
I don't think you understand the gravity of the situation.  
我想你不了解局势的严重性。
The international situation has reached a point of extreme gravity.  
国际形势已发展到极其严峻的地步。

[C] an object which moves very fast by forcing out burning gases, and which is used for space travel, etc. 
火箭
a surface-to-air rocket  
地对空火箭
rocket launcher 
火箭发射器
They have launched a rocket to the moon.  
他们已向月球发射了一枚火箭。

put or take quickly 
快速地放，快速地拿
If you pop the pizza in the oven now it should be ready in 15 minutes.  
如果你现在把比萨饼放在炉子上，过15分钟就好了。
Pop your shoes on and let's go.  
快穿上鞋，我们走吧。

make a short sharp sound, often by bursting sth. 
发出砰的响声
The proper way to open champagne is not to let the cork pop.  
正确的开香槟的方法不会使软木塞迸出来。
The balloons were popping when the children burst them.  
气球被孩子们弄破时发出"砰砰"的响声。

[U] modern popular music 
流行音乐
What do you like to listen to — jazz, classical or pop?  
你想听什么？爵士乐、古典音乐还是流行音乐？
I think the Beatles will always be the world's most famous pop group.  
我认为甲壳虫乐队将永远是世界上最著名的流行乐队。

[C] a large, usu. circular piece of special cloth fastened to sb./sth. that is dropped from an aircraft 
降落伞
They fell 41,000 ft. before opening their parachutes. 
他们从高空降落了4.1万英尺后才打开降落伞。
UN troops could be landed by parachute. 
联合国部队可以用降落伞在那里着陆。

1. manage not to yield to 
顶住，忍受
I can't resist the urge to go home early.  
我无法抗拒早些回家的冲动。
She couldn't resist laughing at him in those clothes.  
看到他穿着那样的衣服，她忍不住笑了起来。
2. fight against 
抵抗，反抗
The party leader resisted his demands of giving in. 
党派领导人拒绝了他投降的要求。
The soldiers resisted the enemy attacks for two days.  
两天来, 战士们抵抗着敌人的进攻。

[C] a device that records sound or increases the loudness of sounds 
麦克风
This microphone doesn't work. Replace it with another one. 
这个麦克风不行，换一个吧。
The interviewer asked her to speak into the microphone.  
采访者让她对着麦克风说话。
Without the microphone, the speakers could not be heard by at least half the audience.  
没有麦克风，至少一半的听众听不清说话者的声音。

[C] an engine or motor in which the pressure of a liquid or gas, usu. at very high temperatures, drives a special wheel, producing a circular movement 
涡轮机，叶轮机，透平机
The turbine eventually gave way to a pair of diesel engines. 
最终，涡轮机被一对柴油发动机所替代。
The crash was caused by a problem from the turbine. 
涡轮机的故障致使飞机坠毁。

wake sb. from sleep; wake up 
唤醒，醒来
He was still asleep so I wakened him. 
他还在睡觉，我就把他给叫醒了。
I shook him but he didn't waken.  
我摇了摇他，但他没有醒。

1. [U] heavy weapons or machinery 
重型武器；重型机器
The White House said yesterday that the ship was laden with tank parts, explosives, and other military hardware.  
白宫昨天宣布说那只船装载着坦克部件、炸弹和其他重型武器。
2. [U] metal tools, materials and equipment used in a house or a garden 
五金器具
a hardware shop 
五金商店
3. [U] mechanical and electronic parts of a computer 
（电脑）硬件
In computer systems, hardware refers to the machines themselves as opposed to the programs which tell the machines what to do. 
在电脑系统中，硬件指的是机器本身，与指示电脑如何运行的程序软件相对。

[U, C] a unit of measuring the power of an engine 
马力（功率单位）
This car could do with a bit more horsepower for getting up hills.  
这辆车马力再大些便能爬山了。
a 300-horsepower engine 
一台300马力的发动机
The engine has more than 4,000 horsepower. 
这台发动机有4,000多马力。

[U] a gray powder that becomes hard like stone after being mixed with water and allowed to dry, used in building 
水泥
a cement factory  
水泥厂
a bag of cement  
一包水泥
cement mixer 
水泥搅拌机
a cement floor 
水泥地板
Builders have trouble getting the right amount of cement into their concrete. 
建筑工人在用适量的水泥浇注混凝土时遇到了麻烦。

1. push, put or throw with great force 
猛力地推、放或扔
She slammed the box down on the table.  
她把盒子使劲摔在桌上。
She was so angry; she slammed the phone down on him.  
她很生气，"砰"地一声挂断了他的电话。
2. shut loudly and forcefully 
砰地关上
Close the door carefully, don't slam it.  
小心地关上门，别使劲摔。
She went out, slamming the door behind her.  
她走了出去，随手"砰"地把门关上。

[C] a gun with a long rifled barrel, which is fired from the shoulder
来复枪，步枪
Rifles are designed to be accurate at long distances.  
步枪被设计用来进行远程精确射击。

[C] the curved shape made by sth. like rope or string crossing itself
圈，环
His writing was childish with large loops on the letters.  
他的字还带着孩子气，字母的圈圈写得很大。
The plane flew round and round in wide loops.  
飞机绕着大圈飞了一圈又一圈。

[C] a large strong bird which eats meat and can see very well
鹰，雕
a golden eagle  
金雕
The eagle has sharp eyes. 
鹰有锐利的目光。
He dreamt of flying in the sky with the grace of an eagle. 
他梦见自己像鹰一样优雅地在空中翱翔。

[U] a silver-white metal that is a simple substance light in weight and easily shaped 
铝
an aluminum pot 
铝锅
We take all our aluminum cans for recycling.  
我们将所有的铝罐回收再利用。

[U] being precise 
准确（性），精确（性），精密（度）
Great precision is required in this aspect.  
这方面需要极高的准确性。
Scientific instruments have to be made with great precision.  
科学仪器必须制造得非常精密。

[C] any object used in fighting or war, such as a gun or a bomb 
武器，兵器
The youths were dragged from their car and searched for weapons.  
这些年轻人被从汽车中拖出来搜查是否携带了武器。
Guns are of little power against modern weapons in war. 
在战争中，枪支与现代武器相比威力比较小。
A missile is a powerful weapon. 
导弹是一种威力强大的武器。
Drugs are effective weapons against many diseases.  
药物是治疗多种疾病的有效武器。

1. [C] an added part 
增加的部分，延伸的部分
The article is an extension of the ideas Professor Fox developed in an earlier book.  
这篇文章是福克斯教授在早期一本著作中阐述的观点的进一步引申。
Our extension is nearly finished.  
我们的扩建工程已接近完工。
2. [U] extending 
伸展，延伸，扩大
The extension of the garden will take several weeks.  
扩建花园需要几个星期。
The extension of police powers in the province has been heavily criticized.  
这个省对警力的扩充受到了严厉的谴责。

1. [C] the height above sea level 
海拔；高度
We are currently flying at an altitude of 15,000 metres.  
我们目前正在海拔15,000米的高空飞行。
The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet. 
飞机到达的飞行高度大约为39,000英尺。
2. (often pl.) a high place or area 
高处；高地
At high altitudes it is difficult to breathe. 
在高处呼吸困难。
Mountain climbers use oxygen when they reach higher altitudes.  
登山者在到达高海拔地区时使用氧气。

1.[C] a very deep and loud hollow sound 
低沉有回响的声音，隆隆声
We heard a boom in the distance as the bomb went off. 
炸弹爆炸时我们听到远处的轰响。
We could hear the booms of the enemy guns in the distance.  
我们可以听到远处敌人炮火的隆隆声。
2.[C] a sudden increase 
暴涨，激增，繁荣
This year has seen a boom in book sales.  
今年图书销售激增。
The consumer boom of the 1980s led to an explosion of shopping center development.  
20世纪80年代的消费繁荣促成了购物中心的快速发展。

1.[C] an enclosed space, esp. in a body or machine 
封闭空间；腔，室
The heart has four chambers. 
心脏有四个心室。
Put the bullet into the firing chamber of your gun. 
把子弹上到枪膛上。
2. [C] a room, esp. a bedroom 
房间，寝室
The children searched each and every chamber in the house for the cat. 
孩子们到房子的每一个房间里寻找那只猫。
The president and his lady retired to their chamber. 
总统和夫人回到寝室。
The debate finished at midnight and the delegates left the chamber shortly afterwards. 
辩论在午夜结束，随后代表们便离开了会议室。
Meetings of the council are held in the council chamber.  
理事会会议在会议室举行。
3.[C] a usu. elected law-making body 
议院
In Britain the upper chamber is the House of Lords, the lower the House of Commons. 
英国上议院叫长老院，下议院叫众议院。

[U] a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 0 degree and boils at 100 degrees  
摄氏度
0o Centigrade equals 32 o Fahrenheit. 
摄氏零度等于华氏32度。
In that country the daytime temperatures can be sometimes up to 40 degrees centigrade. 
在那个国家，白天的温度有时可高达摄氏40度。
The temperature has risen by around one degree centigrade over the last 150 years. 
在过去150年间，温度上升了1摄氏度左右。

of centigrade
摄氏的
We get used to using a centigrade thermometer. 
我们习惯用摄氏温度计。

[C] a long narrow band on a surface that is usu. different from it in color, material, etc. 
条纹，条子
Zebra is a wild African horse with black and white stripes.  
斑马是一种身上有黑白条纹的非洲野马。
Do you think he'd prefer a tie with spots or stripes?  
你认为他喜欢斑点领带还是条纹领带？

unusual; exaggerated 
花哨的，异样的
I wanted a simple black dress, nothing fancy.  
我想要一件样式简洁的黑礼服，不要花哨的东西。
Never mind all these fancy phrases - just tell us the plain facts.  
不要使用什么华丽的辞藻，就告诉我们简单的事实。

1.[U] an idea that cannot be made real 
奇想，想入非非
Buildings should not just be architects' flights of fancy.  
建筑物不应只是建筑师的奇思怪想。
I'd had a childhood fancy that I would one day be famous.  
在孩提时代我曾幻想有一天我会出名。
2.[C] a liking formed without any obvious reason 
喜爱，爱好
I have taken a fancy to that silly hat. 
我特别喜欢那顶怪帽子。
I think young Peter has taken quite a fancy to that girl next door. 
我想小彼得迷上隔壁那个女孩子了。

1. imagine or think 
想像，设想
I fancied I saw something moving in the corner.  
我觉得我看到角落里有什么东西在动。
When she was young she fancied herself a teacher.  
她年轻时幻想成为一名教师。
2. like or wish for 
喜欢，想要
What do you fancy doing, anyway? 
那你想做些什么呢？
Do you fancy going to see a movie tonight? 
你今晚想去看电影吗？
I just fancied a drink. 
我只是想喝点东西。

(used to express any strong emotion, esp. surprise) 
（用来表达强烈的感情，尤指惊奇）啊呀
My goodness, how many more times do I have to tell you!  
天哪，我得再告诉你多少次！
My goodness, what a terrible thought! 
我的天啊，多可怕的想法！

1. rising or falling very quickly 
急剧升降的
Yesterday's steep decline in the value of the dollar was unexpected.  
昨天美元的急剧贬值是出乎意料的。
There's likely to be a steep drop in the cost of petrol.  
石油价格可能会急剧下降。
2. (of a slope) rising or falling at a sharp angle 
陡的，陡峭的
It's a steep climb to the top of the mountain, but the view is worth it.  
上山的道路非常陡峭，但迷人的风景值得一看。
It's dangerous to try and ski down these steep slopes.  
从这些陡坡上滑雪下去很危险。

1. close or complete attention 
全神贯注
This book will need all your concentration. 
读这本书需要全神贯注。
He kept interrupting, breaking my concentration. 
他不停插嘴，分散我的注意力。
2. [U, C] bringing or coming together in a large amount 
集中，群集
He strongly opposed the concentration of power in the hands of a few people.  
他极力反对把权力集中在少数人手里。
Concentrations of police became obvious as they drove further into the town.  
他们驶入城里时，到处可见警察正在集结。

[C] the part of a machine or device which shows a measurement of sth. such as speed or time 
（机器或设备上的）刻度盘，标度盘
On my first flying lesson I was horrified by the number of dials in front of me.  
在第一节飞行课上，我被面前数目众多的刻度盘吓坏了。
The dial of his watch has a picture of Mickey Mouse on it.  
他的手表表盘上有一个米老鼠图案。

make a telephone call by pressing the numbered buttons 
拨打电话
You've dialed your mother's house three times today.  
你今天已经往你母亲家拨了三次电话了。
Jim dialed the wrong number.  
吉姆拨错了电话号码。

of the number; showing information in the form of numbers which can change 
数字的，数字显示的
a digital display  
数字显示
The quality of sound from a digital tape is truly excellent.  
从数字音带中传出的声音质量确实很不错。

press into a smaller space 
压紧，压缩
Firmly compress the soil in the pot so that the plant is secure. 
把盆里的泥土压紧，这样能使植物固定。
I managed to compress ten pages of notes into four paragraphs. 
我成功地把10页笔记压缩成4个段落。

at a higher position or level, or being the top part of sth.
（位置、水平等）较高的，较上的；上层的，上部的
the upper arm 
上手臂
the upper class 
上层阶级
The upper reaches of the river are quiet and flow through gentle countryside.  
上游的河水平缓地从宁静的乡村流过。
The office block's upper floors were on fire. 
办公楼的上面几层着火了。

1. move rapidly and suddenly 
猛地移动
The star was whipped into a fast car and driven off.  
那位明星被人迅速弄进一辆高速汽车开走了。
The wind whipped several leaves from the tree.  
风刮掉了几片树叶。
2. beat (a person or animal) with a whip 
鞭打，鞭笞
I don't like the way the drivers whip their horses.  
我不喜欢马车夫用鞭子抽马的样子。

[C] a piece of leather or rope which is fastened to a handle, used esp. for driving animals or punishing people
鞭子
She beat the horse with her long whip.  
她用长鞭子抽打着马。
There's a shop over there where you can buy whips.  
那儿有一家商店，你可以在那里买鞭子。

[C] an apparatus which can record and play back sound (or pictures) on tape 
录音机，录像机
tape recorder 
盒式录音机
video recorder 
录像机
flight recorder 
飞行记录仪
While you see to playing the recorder, I will take down the words of the song. 
你负责放录音，我来记歌词。
He put the recorder on the desktop and pushed the play button. 
他把录音机放在桌上，然后按下播放键。

1. (pl. craft) [C] a vehicle for traveling on water or through the air 
船，艇，航空器
Eighteen craft set out in the race.  
18艘参赛船出发了。
Small craft took shelter along the east coast during the storm. 
小船靠在东部海岸躲避暴风雨。
2. [U, C] (a job or activity needing) skill and experience 
工艺，手艺
the craft of boat building  
造船工艺
You can always tell by the quality of a hand-made piece of furniture if it was made by someone who knew their craft.  
你总能从手工制作的家具的质量来判断这是否出自能工巧匠之手。

Definitions.PartofSpeech:
remain in the air 
悬浮于空中
There's a branch hanging over, can you reach it and pull yourself out of the water?  
上面有一根树枝，你能够得着它，把自己拖出水吗？
Smog hung over the city.  
烟雾笼罩在城市上空。

connect (sth.) to the electricity supply with a plug 
插上插头
No wonder the lamp didn't come on, it's not plugged in!  
难怪电灯不亮，没有插上插头！
Could you plug in the radio, please?  
请你把收音机插头插上好吗？

become or make full of 
充满，装满，盛满
The lake is filling with heavy rain.  
湖里涨满了雨水。
The secret of happiness is to fill one's life with activity.  
幸福的秘诀在于有一个充实的人生。

(cause to) come or go out for a short time or suddenly 
（使）突然出来，出来一会儿
The window opened and a head popped out. 
窗户开了，一个人突然探出头来。
I had just popped out for a breath of fresh air, and missed your telephone call. 
我刚好出去呼吸点新鲜空气，于是就错过了你的电话。

(cause to) begin to be active, working, etc. 
（使）开始运行
After I've been ill, I find it hard to get going again. 
生病后，我发现再开始有些困难。
Let's get going, or we'll be late. 
我们开始吧，不然就晚了。
It's difficult to get the car going on cold mornings. 
寒冷的早晨发动车子很困难。
Getting a business going in these hard times is almost impossible. 
在这样的艰难时期做生意几乎是不可能的。

rise; climb up 
上升，攀升
Smoke was going up in a straight line, showing that there was no wind.  
烟直线上升，说明无风。
Go up to the top of the stairs and turn right, and that's my room.  
到楼梯顶后往右拐就是我的房间。

put (a load) in or on 
装，装载
I was so loaded with heavy shopping that my back was aching.  
我买的东西太多，把我压得腰酸背疼。
The air is loaded with smoke and dirt.  
空气中弥漫着烟雾和灰尘。

further forward in space or time than; in front of 
（在空间或时间上）超前，在……前面
London is about five hours ahead of New York. 
伦敦比纽约早5小时。
Jim was ahead of all the other runners. 
吉姆领先于其他所有的赛跑者。

give the control or management of sth. to sb. 
把（某事）交给（某人）处理
This difficulty is not something we can deal with, so we had better turn it over to the director.  
这一困难不是我们能对付得了的，最好交给主任去处理。
He turned the business over to his daughter.  
他把商行交给他女儿管理。

call to mind; remember 
想起，记得
I am glad that you thought of this hotel, where you stayed last year.  
我很高兴你记起了去年住过这家旅馆。
I can't think of the title of the book, but it's a fat red one on the top shelf near the left.  
我记不起那本书的书名了，只记得是一本厚厚的红皮书，放在书架最高层的左边。

replace sb./sth. 
代替
I know that no one can take your mother's place, but I'll do my best to give you a good home. 
我知道谁也无法取代你母亲的位置，但我会尽力给你一个舒适的家。
Will Mr. Green take George's place?  
格林先生将接替乔治的位置吗？

begin to act or behave in a specific way 
开始（某活动）
This car won't go into reverse.  
这辆轿车不能倒车。
She went into fits of laughter.  
她发出阵阵笑声。

construct or repair sth. by fitting parts together 
装配，组装
You still have to learn how to put a sentence together properly.  
你还要学习如何恰当地连词成句。
It will be difficult to put a team together with many of our best players away.  
由于我们的许多优秀队员已经离开，要组建一个球队很困难。

compel into 
迫使进入
I can't force the key into this lock; it won't fit.  
我无法把钥匙插进这个锁孔，钥匙不对。

1. continue in spite of difficulties 
坚持
Painting the house is tiring, but if you hang on, the results are worth the effort. 
粉刷房子很累，但如果坚持下来的话，你的辛劳是值得的。
The town was surrounded by the enemy and the citizens did not know if they could hang on until help arrived. 
敌人包围了这个市镇，市民们不知能否坚持到援军到来。
2. continue holding 
抓紧，抓牢
The climber had to hang on while his companions went to find a rope.  
在同伴们去找绳子时，那个登山者只好紧紧抓牢。
Although the branch was breaking, he hung on.  
那根树枝快断了，但他还是紧紧地抓着。
帕特里克·汉密尔顿少校
